articles.title: Snowflake shares surge as AI boom fuels demand for data platforms
articles.summary: Snowflake shares jumped about 14% on Thursday riding a wave of demand for its artificial intelligence database products, as companies race to modernize their data infrastructure and simplify AI adoption.
articles.translated_title: Snowflake shares surge as AI boom fuels demand for data platforms
articles.translated_summary: Snowflake shares jumped about 14% on Thursday riding a wave of demand for its artificial intelligence database products, as companies race to modernize their data infrastructure and simplify AI adoption.

articles.title: Snowflake's CEO Says AI Is Not 'Plateauing:' Enterprise Adoption Still In 'Very, Very Early Innings' - Ample 'Runway' Ahead
articles.summary: Snowflake CEO Sridhar Ramaswamy pushed back against the growing narrative that artificial intelligence models are beginning to plateau.
articles.translated_title: Snowflake's CEO Says AI Is Not 'Plateauing:' Enterprise Adoption Still In 'Very, Very Early Innings' - Ample 'Runway' Ahead
articles.translated_summary: Snowflake CEO Sridhar Ramaswamy pushed back against the growing narrative that artificial intelligence models are beginning to plateau.

articles.title: What AI got right. Lessons for the rest of the business world.
articles.summary: As artificial intelligence reshapes industries, experts say non-tech companies can learn from Silicon Valley's playbook.
articles.translated_title: What AI got right. Lessons for the rest of the business world.

articles.title: New study sheds light on what kinds of workers are losing jobs to AI
articles.summary: Stanford University research offers insights for students and young workers as artificial intelligence begins to reshape the labor market.
articles.translated_title: New study sheds light on what kinds of workers are losing jobs to AI

articles.title: Nvidia Q2 Results Aftermath: Crypto AI Tokens Edge Lower Amid Decline In Chip Giant's Stock
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence-based cryptocurrencies were trading lower early Thursday, coinciding with AI powerhouse Nvidia Corp.'s (NASDAQ:NVDA) post-earnings decline.
articles.translated_title: Nvidia Q2 Results Aftermath: Crypto AI Tokens Edge Lower Amid Decline In Chip Giant's Stock

articles.title: Ukraine Wants to Turn Wartime Data Into Bargaining 'Card' With Allies
articles.summary: Ukraine's war footage and records, which its digital minister says are "priceless," can be useful for training combat artificial intelligence models.
articles.translated_title: Ukraine Wants to Turn Wartime Data Into Bargaining 'Card' With Allies
articles.translated_summary: Ukraine's war footage and records, which its digital minister says are "priceless," can be useful for training combat artificial intelligence models.

articles.title: Trump's First-Term Ban On EUV Tools Stalled Huawei, SMIC, Cambricon - Now China's Chip Factories Are Roaring Back, Warns David Sacks
articles.summary: White House-appointed "Crypto Czar" David Sacks warned Wednesday that Chinese semiconductor manufacturers are surging back despite previous export controls, citing new production data showing China's chipmakers planning to triple artificial intelligence processor output.
articles.translated_title: Trump's First-Term Ban On EUV Tools Stalled Huawei, SMIC, Cambricon - Now China's Chip Factories Are Roaring Back, Warns David Sacks
articles.translated_summary: White House-appointed "Crypto Czar" David Sacks warned Wednesday that Chinese semiconductor manufacturers are surging back despite previous export controls, citing new production data showing China's chipmakers planning to triple artificial intelligence processor output.

articles.title: Nvidia CEO says AI boom far from over
articles.summary: Jensen Huang dismissed concern about an end to a spending boom on artificial intelligence chips, projecting opportunities will expand into a multi-trillion-dollar market over the next five years.
articles.translated_title: Nvidia CEO says AI boom far from over
articles.translated_summary: Jensen Huang dismissed concern about an end to a spending boom on artificial intelligence chips, projecting opportunities will expand into a multi-trillion-dollar market over the next five years.

articles.title: Nvidia CEO says AI boom far from over after tepid sales forecast
articles.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on Wednesday dismissed concern about an end to a spending boom on artificial intelligence chips and said opportunities will expand into a multi-trillion-dollar market over the next five years.
articles.translated_title: Nvidia CEO says AI boom far from over after tepid sales forecast

articles.title: Jensen Huang Declares 'A New Industrial Revolution Has Started': Sees 100x To 1000x Compute Demand Surge - $3-$4 Trillion 'Opportunity' For Nvidia
articles.summary: Chipmaker NVIDIA Corp.'s (NASDAQ: NVDA) CEO, Jensen Huang, just announced an optimistic vision for the future of artificial intelligence during the company's second-quarter earnings call on Wednesday.
